Path.description: This function is a wrapper around the pathlib.Path and returns a compatible Path with a windows path copied inside Linux (for WSL)

Section.description: This class defines decorator instances allowing to create section functions.

debug.description: This function will give and create the debug folder for a given python file.

folder.description: This function creates a new folder, while crushing previous instances if already exists.

getmodule.description: This function is to be used in a library __init__ file. It creates lazy imports of the module imported and defines __getattr__ and __all__ for this library.

kwargsself.description: This function will return all the attributes of an object (self) into a dictionnary (kwargs)

main.description: This function can decorate the main function of a script.

print.description: This function overrides python built in print function to add functionnalities.

prop.description: This function serves as an improved property decorator.

rfrom.description: This function allows to do a relative import that works in module and script modes.

selfkwargs.description: This function takes a dictionnary and sets all its values to an object (self).

test.description: This function will launch the testfile for the current file using pytest library.
